title: Cafe Malik
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual pub/bar with an extensive vegan menu with such items as several in-house-made cakes, wafers, hot drinks made with soy, soups, salads and hot dishes always available. Management is well-informed and committed to offer vegan dishes.
